CatDescriptText: Judy Isacco, student, Mt. Lebanon and Jackie Bost, hospital attendant, Hill District, were part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper, July 28, 1962, pg. 15 with question: "When do you think the Pirates will move into first place?"  Ms. Isacco's answer reads: "I don't think they ever will.  They have a good team this year, but Los Angeles and San Francisco are better."  Mr. Bost's answer reads: "I hope they will some time this season, but probably not.  Still, I'm with them all the way."
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Portrait of Judy Isacco wearing light colored short sleeve dress with button down bodice, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown; Portrait of Jackie Bost wearing light colored polo shirt and eyeglasses, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
